definition: surname Yi/alternative name for 絳|绛[Jiang4] capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)
wing/area surrounding the bullseye of a target/to assist/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/old variant of 翌

sentences.english: A new kind of modelling was proposed on aircraft wing structural analysis and optimization.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種新的飛機翼面結構分析和優化的建模技術。

sentences.english: The other safety procedure includes inspecting the shuttle wings’ leading edges and nose cap.
sentences.chinese: 其他安全程序包括檢查航天飛機的機翼前緣和頭椎部。

sentences.english: Wing section and survival rates as second-class cabin seats 56%.
sentences.chinese: 機翼段和二等艙段座位的生還率同爲56%。

sentences.english: Optical lift is different from the aerodynamic lift created by an airfoil.
sentences.chinese: 光學提拉力與機翼翼面產生的空氣動力不同。

sentences.english: The anti-aircraft guns riddled the plane's wings with bullets.
sentences.chinese: 防空炮把機翼打得彈痕累累。

sentences.english: The Vista is equipped with large stabilizers & control surfaces for excellent handling and low speed controllability (elevator & stabilizer span is carefully matched to wing span).
sentences.chinese: 大跨度，高展弦比機翼提供優異攀登性能。

sentences.english: When a spoiler is raised, the wing on that side drops.
sentences.chinese: 當一個擾流片揚起的時候，另一邊的機翼就會下降。

sentences.english: The plane rolled left and then rolled right. Then he caught an edge of his wing on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 飛機時而向左時而向右滾動，最終機翼觸地。

sentences.english: If you are susceptible to motion sickness, your best bet is to sit over the wing.
sentences.chinese: 如果你很容易暈機，你最好坐在機翼附近。

sentences.english: But all the failing instruments were in the left wing.
sentences.chinese: 但所有故障裝置都位於左機翼。

sentences.english: Bracketing the wedge-shaped ship were a set of flat wings extending above and below the ship.
sentences.chinese: 一組平板機翼上下張開，緊貼楔形船體兩側。

sentences.english: The tufts along the fuselage and wings perform a similar function.
sentences.chinese: 沿機身和機翼塔夫茨執行類似的功能。

sentences.english: The wings of the plane have iced up and it is too dangerous to fly.
sentences.chinese: 飛機的機翼已經結上了冰，起飛太危險了。

sentences.english: The potential flow theory is then applied to the overlap of the slipstream and the flow over the wing.
sentences.chinese: 用位流理論來處理螺旋槳滑流與機翼繞流的迭加。

sentences.english: a hinged vertical airfoil mounted at the tail of an aircraft and used to make horizontal course changes.
sentences.chinese: 安裝在飛機尾部的用來改變水平方向的垂直機翼。

sentences.english: The wings have controllable sections known as ailerons .
sentences.chinese: 機翼上可操縱的部分叫做副翼。

definition: the front (nose) of a plane etc
the rear (tail) of a plane etc
